scripts.link: npm link botium-connector-dialogflow botium-connector-webdriverio botium-connector-directline3 botium-core
scripts.build:free-dist: npm run eslint && cross-env BUILDTARGET=basic rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-agent.js --output dist/botium-box-agent.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.build:premium-dist: npm run eslint && cross-env BUILDTARGET=premium rollup -c && javascript-obfuscator dist/botium-box-agent.js --output dist/botium-box-agent.js --compact true --self-defending true
scripts.publish:free-dist: npm run build:free-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-dist/basic/agent  && cp -Rf dist package.json package-lock.json ~/botium-box-dist/basic/agent && cp .env.botium-box-basic-dist ~/botium-box-dist/basic/agent/.env
scripts.publish:premium-dist: npm run build:premium-dist && mkdir -p ~/botium-box-dist/premium/agent  && cp -Rf dist package.json package-lock.json ~/botium-box-dist/premium/agent && cp .env.production ~/botium-box-dist/premium/agent/.env
